long_description: The Ahnu Karma slip-on shoes are easy to wear and easy to pack, making them well-suited to adventuring, whether abroad or around town. Leather uppers offer soft, pliable wear in sophisticated style you can take to the office or dinner on the town. Heel pockets stretch to ensure a comfortable, secure fit; heels fold down for compact storage and easy traveling. Pigskin leather and microfiber suede linings ensure next-to-skin comfort; contoured footbeds supply light support. EVA midsoles supply lightweight cushion for all-day walking. Ahnu Karma shoes feature nonmarking rubber outsoles for reliable traction on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: The Ahnu Karma slip-on shoes are easy to wear and easy to pack, making them well-suited to adventuring, whether abroad or around town.
